Class DialogHelper

java.lang.Object
org.geotools.tutorial.txtreader.DialogHelper
public class DialogHelper extends Object
DialogHelper: Utility class for creating and setting up dialogs and panels.

  • Method Details

    • createDialog

      public static JDialog createDialog(JFrame mapFrame, String title)
      Creates a modal JDialog with a specified title.
      Parameters:
      mapFrame - the parent JFrame for the dialog.
      title - the title of the dialog.
      Returns:
      a new JDialog instance.

    • createPanel

      public static JPanel createPanel(int rows, int cols)
      Creates a JPanel with a GridLayout the specified dimensions and padded borders.
      Parameters:
      rows - the number of rows in the grid layout.
      cols - the number of columns in the grid layout.
      Returns:
      a new JPanel with the specified amount of rows and columns.

    • setupDialog

      public static void setupDialog(JDialog dialog, JPanel panel, JFrame mapFrame)
      Adds JPanel to JDialog, sets the positioning and displays the JDialog.
      Parameters:
      dialog - the JDialog to be configured.
      panel - the JPanel to be added to the dialog.
      mapFrame - the parent JFrame.

    • createColorChooserButton

      public static JButton createColorChooserButton(JDialog dialog, Color defaultColor, String label)
      Creates a JButton that opens a color chooser dialog when clicked.
      Parameters:
      dialog - the parent dialog for the color chooser.
      defaultColor - the initial color for the button.
      label - the label for the button.
      Returns:
      a JButton configured to choose a color.
